TextBlock.Text: SALVIA: From a brief analysis, we know these blooms to be a highly potent hallucinogenic.
FITTONIA: Indeed. They could theoretically deliver this toxin through physical contact.
SALVIA: Curiously, they also emit this toxin into the atmosphere in smaller amounts.
MUELLER: However, they clearly have no effect on us. Hypothesis: our kind's skin is not porous enough to be susceptible.
